title: Correction to: A review of the varunid crab genus Parapyxidognathus Ward, 1941 (Decapoda: Brachyura: Varunidae), with descriptions of two new species
content: This is a correction to: Jhih-Wei Hsu, Hsi-Te Shih, A review of the varunid crab genus Parapyxidognathus Ward, 1941 (Decapoda: Brachyura: Varunidae), with descriptions of two new species, Journal of Crustacean Biology, Volume 44, Issue 2, June 2024, ruae022, https://doi.org/10.1093/jcbiol/ruae022
siteTitle: Journal of Crustacean Biology Current Issue
